title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Nativity", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 7 Gulielmo della Porta Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Above, Virgin with standing child, in what seems to be niche with bands of decoration on arch; clouds at center divide composition supported by four putti below, resembling caryatids.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Nativity", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3554-2.
